document_data.name: Rezifo
document_data.mainbody: '''Rezifo''' was a steward of the [[Gudelmer]] family and its patriarch [[Albaerlus Gudelmer]], active in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In the late 14{{th}} century DR, Rezifo resided in the Gudelmer family estate â€“ the [[Dancing Dolphins House]], located in the opulent [[Athkatla/Gem District|Gem District]] of [[Athkatla]]. The steward of the Dancing Dolphins House was the only person, apart from the family's patriarch, whose mental commands controlled numerous gleaming suits of [[armor]] that lined the estate's cavernous entryway. These suits of armor were reportedly animated [[helmed horror]]s.
